name: ai.undream.llm
description: LLM for Unity allows to run and distribute Large Language Models (LLMs) in the Unity engine.

samples.description: Simple interaction with an AI character
Simple interaction using multiple AI characters
Simple detective game using a knowledge base to provide information to the LLM.
Interaction between a player and a AI with a UI similar to a messaging app
Example Android app with an initial screen with model download progress
Semantic search using a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) system. Includes example using a RAG to feed information to a LLM.
